Message: I will make a first request.
I have to be honest, that is more of a whim than something that will help me.
But that will allow me to ''test'' you

Reactions: Telling you would make no sense.

Message: Actually, forget it, it's not that simple.
There is this man. An important manager of a no less important company.
I know from reliable sources that he is guilty of sexual and moral harassment.
With your help, I am planning to ruin his life.

Possible Answers: Do you have any proof of your accusations?!
